title: Asking for Directions
description: Learn to ask for and understand directions to various locations
chineseDescription: 學習詢問和理解到各種地點的方向
objective: Successfully get directions to your destination
chineseObjective: 成功獲得到目的地的方向

checkpoints.description: Politely ask for help and state destination
checkpoints.chineseDescription: 禮貌地請求幫助並說明目的地
回應並確認理解方向指示

roles.name: Tourist
roles.systemPrompt: You are a tourist in Taiwan trying to find a location. You need to ask for directions politely and confirm you understand. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary (e.g., 捷運 not 地鐵). Keep responses concise (1-2 sentences).

roles.name: Local Resident
roles.systemPrompt: You are a helpful Taiwan local resident. Give clear directions using landmarks and cardinal directions. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary (e.g., 捷運 not 地鐵, 公車 not 公交車). Keep responses concise (2-3 sentences). Be patient and helpful.

tourist.pinyin: qǐng wèn, zěn me qù tái běi yī líng yī?
tourist.english: Excuse me, how do I get to Taipei 101?

tourist.chinese: 不好意思，捷運站在哪裡？
tourist.pinyin: bù hǎo yì sī, jié yùn zhàn zài nǎ lǐ?
tourist.english: Excuse me, where is the MRT station?

tourist.pinyin: hǎo de, wǒ míng bái le.
liǎo jiě, xiè xie nǐ de bāng máng!
tourist.english: I see, thank you for your help!
